Name: Vegetable Samosa
Description: Lightly spiced Indian turnovers, stuffed potatoes and peas (2 pieces).

Name: Seekh Kebab
Description: Minced lamb mixed with exotic herbs and spices. Tandoored in clay oven.

Name: Chicken Tikka Masala
Description: Boneless piece of chicken breast, tandoored in clay oven and then blended in our curry sauce.
